      • fillArrayList

        public void fillArrayList()
        Fills the array list with the indexes of the field and its neighbours that are of the same colour for every field of the board.

      • removeSameBalls

        public void removeSameBalls()
        Sets all the balls in the fields of the board with neighbours of the same colour to Colour.EMPTY.

      • isMoveValid

        public boolean isMoveValid()
        Checks if the arrayList size is different from zero in order to know if currently there are any balls on the board that are neighbours and have the same colour.
        Returns:
        true if the arrayList has a value different than zero

      • updateCopy

        public void updateCopy()
        Updates all the values of the copy of the board to the values of the board.

      • reverseMove

        public void reverseMove()
        Updates all the values of the board to the values of the copy of the original board.

      • fillSingleMovesMap

        public void fillSingleMovesMap()
        Fill the map with all the possible single moves as keys and set their value to true of false depending on whether the move is possible or not.

      • noPossibleSingleMoves

        public boolean noPossibleSingleMoves()
        Goes through the singleMoves map and checks if there is a single move left for the players to use.
        Returns:
        true if there are no possible single moves for the board

      • singleMove

        public void singleMove​(Player player,
                       int command)
        Make a single move. The method first checks if a single move can be performed. If it can it makes the move, sets the balls to be removed to the player performing the move and then removes the balls from the board. Then it updates the board copy and fills the map with the new possible single moves.
        Parameters:
        command - the command used to move rows or columns that should gather balls from the same colour

      • doubleMove

        public void doubleMove​(Player player,
                       int command1,
                       int command2)
        Make a double move. Make two movements on the board, then check if the move was valid. If the move was valid set the balls to be removed to the player performing the move and then remove those balls from the board. Update the copy and the single moves map.
        Parameters:
        command1 - the first move used to move a row or a column
        command2 - the second move that should gather balls from the same colour

      • noPossibleDoubleMoves

        public boolean noPossibleDoubleMoves()
        Checks if any double moves can be performed if single moves cannot be performed.
        Returns:
        true if no single moves can be performed and there exists a valid double move

      • getBoard

        public Board getBoard()

      • getSameNeighboursArrayList

      • getSingleMoves

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Boolean> getSingleMoves()

      • takeBalls

        public void takeBalls​(Player player)
        Fills the player's map with the balls he has removed from the board.
        Parameters:
        player - the player that is at turn
